post:
Hello LET, we are pleased to announce the release of our new stock in Düsseldorf, packed with features and low on prices!

We are a UK based VPS hosting business founded in 2011. We offer high power virtual private server hosting on enterprise hardware and a rock solid network in Düsseldorf, Germany. Our services are intended for experienced Linux users that do not require 24/7 support or hand-holding and don't want to pay for it.

- Xeon E3-1240 Hardware
- Hardware RAID10 (Adaptec Controllers)
- Premium Bandwidth (Level3, Tinet, Cogent, Lambdanet)
- Native IPv6 Support (5 Free addresses included)
- 5GB Off-site FTP/RSYNC backup space
- Private multi-redundant network (AS29141)
- Free UK DNS Hosting
- OpenVZ Virtualization
- SolusVM & Instant Setup

Our hardware nodes run powerful Xeon E31240 Sandy Bridge CPUs with 15K disk arrays for increased performance and redundancy. We utilize premium upstream bandwidth from carriers such as Level3, Tinet, Lambdanet and Cogent. Our servers are located within a private section of the Equinix facility in Düsseldorf which is native IPv6 ready.

**Test IPv4** 130.255.184.170 
**Test IPv6** 2a02:0e00:ffff:fff2:0000:0000:95eb:7673
**Test File** http://130.255.184.170/100mb.test

20GB HDD Space

1 Xeon CPU Core
300GB Data Transfer

If you have any questions, comments or require a custom quote please dont hesitate to contact us, either by replying here or emailing our sales department at sales[at]vmport.com

Thank you for reading!
